lyrics.text:
Mou fanongo ki he le’o
Kuo fakaongo
Mei hēvani ‘i ‘olunga
Kia kitautolu.

’Oku fakahā totonu
‘Oku monū’ia
‘A e kakai kuo mate
Tui ki he ‘Eiki.

Pea Folofola ki ai
‘A e Laumālie
He ‘oku nau mālōlō ai
‘I he’enau ngāue.

Na’e hangē ko e mohe
‘A ‘enau pekia
Ko e mohe ‘ia Sīsū
Pea monū’ia.

Ko ‘enau pekia tui
Ki honau ‘Otua,
Pea fiemālie ai
Honau laumālie.

Ko e ngaahi ‘ahi’ahi
Na’a nau ongo’i,
Pea mo ‘enau mamahi
Kuo toki ‘osi.
